document.full_text: lockheed martin corp, the world's biggest aerospace company and the pentagon's no. 1 supplier by sales, has been hit by an unspecified cyber incident, the government said on saturday.
document.title: lockheed martin hit by cyber incident, u.s. says
lines_and_colors: lockheed martin corp, the world's biggest aerospace company and the pentagon's no. 1 supplier by sales, has been hit by an unspecified cyber incident, the government said on saturday.
